Subjects: Christ, appeal of, to man; crucifixion
_description: Christ’s Appeal from the Cross to Unkind Man — three quatrain (abab), inserted in a variant text of the prose tract on Three Arrows

CULFf540.First Lines:
Now vndirstond þou vnkende manleft vp þin heued &
                    loke to me…
CULFf540.Last Lines:
…forthy þo behoueth now nedely schewewhat þat
                    þou hauest tholid or don for me
